item.title: Upcoming Events
item.description: SKEGNESS COACH TRIP `24 Sunday 12th May 2024 We are happy to announce the return of our popular Skegness coach trip on Sunday 12th May 2024! Departs: Leicester General Hospital @08:00 (Free Parking) Returns: Leaving Skegness @17:00 Tickets are available on a first-come, first-served basis at the bargain price of just Â£15 per person. Renal patients will get refunded on the day. Be sure to bring your Sun Screen as Claire has also booked the weather!
